name: A Story About a Man and His Very Cheap Family
name_original: A Story About a Man and His Very Cheap Family
description:
A heart touching story about a man losing his loved ones.
Work as a courier to save your family from slavery.

Made for the 2021 Epic MegaJam  with the "Running out of space" theme, but, unfortunately, we were a little late with the deadline.

We are currently in a process of polishing the game and adding more content.
